CommandDefinition.Name: enablecrons
CommandDefinition.Description: Enables all (or some) Cron Like Orders in one application version.

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the application in which the Cron Like Orders should be enabled

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The version name of the application in which the Cron Like Orders should be enabled

Argument.Name: orderType
Argument.Description: Ordertype(s) of Cron Like Orders to be enabled. If set, other Cron Like Orders will be ignored.

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace in which the Cron Like Orders should be enabled
